channel.description: Recent content in windows11 on Systems Management Squad

item.title: Removing The Built-in Teams App in Windows 11 with Intune
item.description: Intro So you’ve started rolling out Windows 11 to your endpoints, and your users got confused and upset over the consumer teams apps that is installed? Understandably you wish to do something about this. (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻ No worries mate, Intune Proactive Remediations to the rescue! The Solution The code below fixes two things. It removes the chat by writing the registry key that disables it the TaskbarMn DWORD controls this Then it simply uninstalls the appx package for the consumer teams app, note that this has no effect on the regular teams app.
